content: Thanks to everyone showing progress during the Connectathon! I was looking further into the Example Use Cases (for example http://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/davinci-deqm/col.html) and was curious if there is a repo or other work available that explores more of the common quality measures? Historically the HEDIS IG (http://build.fhir.org/ig/cqframework/hedis-ig/index.html) documented the common Payer Measures. Any chance anyone is working on expanding the DEQM Example Use Cases and wants to share and/or collaborate? @Bryn Rhodes any thoughts?

@Nick Blake, yes, there are quite a few example measures that we have been using for testing in the Clinical Reasoning track at connectathons (we'll be doing another round in January): https://github.com/dbcg/connectathon
There's a quick start here that will walk through loading and running those: https://github.com/DBCG/connectathon/wiki/Quickstart
And we're always looking for more measures/use cases to test.
